headline.main: 'Insufficient' Evidence for Routine Hearing Tests, Experts Say

docs.abstract: The United States Preventive Services Task Force declined on Monday to recommend hearing tests for older adults without symptoms of hearing loss.

docs.lead_paragraph: Florida is emerging as a test of the Republican Party’s gamble that concerns over the deficit will trump voters’ worries about Paul D. Ryan’s proposed Medicare overhaul.

headline.main: Medicare Rises as Prime Election Issue
headline.print_headline: Medicare Rises As Voters' Issue In G.O.P. Gamble

docs.abstract: Medicare comes to the forefront as an election issue with presumptive Republican nominee Mitt Romney's selection of Rep Paul D Ryan as his running mate; Florida emerges as a test of the Republican Party’s gamble that concerns over the deficit will trump voters’ worries about Ryan’s proposed Medicare overhaul.
docs.snippet: Florida is emerging as a test of the Republican Party’s gamble that concerns over the deficit will trump voters’ worries about Paul D. Ryan’s proposed Medicare overhaul.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Michael Barbaro in St. Augustine, Fla.; Carlos Harrison in Miami; Fernanda Santos in Sun City, Ariz.; and Susan Saulny in Scranton, Pa.

docs.lead_paragraph: Paul D. Ryan’s talk of shrinking Big Government and giving tax cuts to “job creators” will do nothing to reverse the nation’s economic decline and arrest its fiscal collapse.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by former Office of Management and Budget director David A Stockman looks at budget plan and policies of Rep Paul D Ryan of Wisconsin, Mitt Romney's vice presidential running mate; contends that Ryan's talk of shrinking Big Government and giving tax cuts to the superwealthy under the guise of creating jobs will do nothing to reverse the nation's economic decline and arrest its fiscal collapse.
docs.snippet: Paul D. Ryan’s talk of shrinking Big Government and giving tax cuts to “job creators” will do nothing to reverse the nation’s economic decline and arrest its fiscal collapse.

docs.lead_paragraph: Romney's choice of Ryan has the merit of opening a serious debate about the debt undermining America.
docs.snippet: Romney's choice of Ryan has the merit of opening a serious debate about the debt undermining America.

docs.lead_paragraph: Representative Paul D. Ryan has said he wants to focus on the nation’s looming debt crisis, but Democrats are assailing his stances on issues like abortion, gun control and women’s health.

headline.seo: Paul D. Ryan’s Social Views Come to the Forefront
headline.main: As Ryan Looks to Focus on Economy, Spotlight Shines on His Other Views
headline.print_headline: As Ryan Looks to Focus On Economy, Spotlight Shines on His Other Views

docs.abstract: Rep Paul D Ryan of Wisconsin, who has been chosen as Mitt Romney's vice-presidential running mate, has said he wants to focus on the nation’s looming debt crisis, but Democrats are assailing his stances on issues like abortion, gun control and women’s health.
docs.snippet: Representative Paul D. Ryan has said he wants to focus on the nation’s looming debt crisis, but Democrats are assailing his stances on issues like abortion, gun control and women’s health.

docs.lead_paragraph: While it is not uncommon for a presidential candidate to know his opponent’s No. 2 better, the history between President Obama and Paul Ryan sets up an especially intriguing showdown.

headline.seo: Obama and Ryan, From Potential Partners to Rivals
headline.main: For Ryan and Obama, More Than the Usual Rivalry
headline.print_headline: With a History of Sparring, Obama and Ryan Are Ready for a Showdown

docs.abstract: Pres Barack Obama and Rep Paul D Ryan, both leading antagonists in an increasingly rancorous debate over the size and scope of government, have been sparring with each other since Obama was elected in 2008; their history should make for an especially intriguing showdown.
docs.snippet: While it is not uncommon for a presidential candidate to know his opponent’s No. 2 better, the history between President Obama and Paul Ryan sets up an especially intriguing showdown.

docs.abstract: Strategists at the pro-Obama super PAC are excited to run against the budget proposals of Mitt Romney's running mate.
docs.snippet: Strategists at the pro-Obama super PAC are excited to run against the budget proposals of Mitt Romney's running mate.

docs.abstract: As the selection of Paul Ryan shows, the schism between the Obama and Romney doctrines of fairness is wide. But only one of them offers the moral clarity needed to guide policy.
docs.snippet: As the selection of Paul Ryan shows, the schism between the Obama and Romney doctrines of fairness is wide. But only one of them offers the moral clarity needed to guide policy.
